version_description:
- Fixed some issues
- Improved some UI

- Fixed some issues
- Improved some UI

- Web content can now be viewed in the Toreba app
- Fixed an issue in which the game sounds may continue to play after exiting a machine
- Fixed an issue with the UI display
- Fixed an issue with the volume control settings
- Fixed an issue with the text display in some areas
- Improved stability and various bug fixes
